Elita:

elita looked at the conflit, she was scared for her uncle.


From: =
Preston Carroll 
Sent: Friday, March 19, 2010 5:08 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroup=
s.com 
Subject: Re: Back to the Ark


  
> Kup continue chasing and shootin=
g agaisnt Nightshift while elita had woke up and walked towards the command=
 center and walking towards Lord Elder, and tried to climb a nearby chair h=
oping to see  what was goin on

Lord Elder looked over at Elita, a smile on=
 his face. He was still not
the most comfortable around the younger ones, b=
ut as long as they
weren't crying it was good. He smiled at her as he helpe=
d her into a
sitting position near him.

He glanced back at the sensors. Th=
at grey dot had reappeared again. He
tried to examine it, but could get no =
permanent fix on it. It jumped
across the screen.

"What ever it is, it's h=
eavily cloaked." he said to himself. "Its only
the senor enhancements that =
allow us to get this much." Elder mumbled
as he was thankful to the enhance=
ment Legacy had installed. Still, it
was only barely enough. They could onl=
y see the dot if it was moving
quickly, when it slowed down it disappeared.=
 He suspected that only
because it was so close to the Ark that he was able=
 to detect it at
all.

He opened a communication channel to the Maximals, "=
When you guys are
done, that sensor ghost is back, I'm not sure if it ever =
actually
left. It's still flying around the outside of the Ark."

(TAG)

Pr=
eston
